alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:59AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow showers continue early this morning. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Dilkon, Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Holbrook, Jacob Lake, Kykotsmovi, Page, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman, Snowflake- Taylor, Valle, Williams and Winslow. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow-covered road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 6 AM Today: Dilkon 0 to 1 inches Doney Park 0 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 0 to 1 inches Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Holbrook 0 to 1 inches Jacob Lake 0 to 1 inches Kykotsmovi 0 to 1 inches Page 0 to 1 inches Prescott 0 inches Prescott Valley 0 inches Sedona 0 inches Seligman 0 inches Snowflake-Taylr 0 to 1 inches Valle 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches Winslow 0 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
